title: 10 Ways to Get $10 Free PayPal Money Instantly
description: The post 10 Ways to Get $10 Free PayPal Money Instantly appeared first on Millennial Money. While some sites offer $10 free PayPal money instantly, some of these methods actually require time, effort, and patience. The post 10 Ways to Get $10 Free PayPal Money Instantly appeared first on Millennial Money.
author: Grant Sabatier
excerpt: Earning $10 in free PayPal money is possible through several online avenues - it won't be instant, but it will work!
text: We get it. There are some times when you need extra money in your bank account now. While earning money usually requires time and effort, there are legitimate ways that you can get free money directly to your PayPal account.Does this sound too good to be true? We promise it isn’t – but in all transparency it won’t be instant – it will take some time and effort.Lots of cashback, get-paid-to (GPT), and survey sites offer hefty welcome bonuses to get new users to sign up and get started. Leveraging these sign-up bonuses can help boost your bank account balance now and potentially earn you money in the future.Keep reading to learn more about 10 ways you can earn free $10 PayPal money now.How to Get $10 Free PayPal Money Now Take Surveys on Branded Surveys Make Money with Survey Junkie Earn Points with Swagbucks Play Games on Mistplay Watch Videos on InboxDollars Earn Cashback on MyPoints Scan Your Receipts with Ibotta Shop with Rakuten Drive for Uber Eats Invest with Robinhood 1. Take Surveys on Branded SurveysWe all have opinions, so why not get paid for them? Taking surveys on Branded Surveys is an easy way to make real money in your free time.In exchange for your honest feedback, Branded Surveys will reward you with points that accumulate over time. Once you have 1,000 points (equivalent to $10), you can cash out your earnings in the form of gift cards or a PayPal payment.The biggest question surrounding online surveys is whether they are worth it or not. While you won’t get rich on Branded Surveys, you can earn anywhere from five to 100 points per activity that you complete.If you take enough surveys and do all the initial tasks, you should be able to easily reach the 1,000 point threshold.2. Make Money with Survey JunkieIf you are looking for a way to earn free gift cards and extra cash in your spare time, taking surveys through Survey Junkie can get you $10 through PayPal in no time.Survey Junkie is one of the most popular get-paid-to (GPT) sites on the internet. They have more than 20 million members worldwide and have paid out over $1 million since their platform launched.The earning potential on Survey Junkie is pretty good compared to other GPT and survey sites. By just taking surveys, you can expect to earn as much as $3 per survey and up to $40 per month.You can earn even more by utilizing Survey Junkie’s referral program. When you send a referral link to your friends and family, you both will earn $5 in your account balance when they sign up for an account. This means you can earn $10 instantly by referring only two friends to the platform.3. Earn Points with SwagbucksYou can earn $10 easily with Swagbucks’ sign-up promo, but your earning potential doesn’t stop there. You can rack up PayPal cash rewards, Amazon gift cards, and more by shopping online, taking surveys, and playing games in your free time.Swagbucks is a popular and reputable GPT site that offers several ways to earn money online by performing simple tasks. Like other survey and GPT sites, Swagbucks partners with retailers and market research companies to gain consumer insights through surveys and other interactive tasks, such as playing games and watching videos.Earning your first $10 with Swagbucks is easy with their sign-on bonus. Signing up is easy, and it only takes a few minutes to get your account set up and ready to go. To receive your bonus, you have to spend at least $25 through Swagbucks’ cashback platform under the URL Swagbucks.com/Shop. Once your purchase is confirmed, Swagbucks will deposit 1,000, equivalent to $10, into your account.4. Play Games on MistplayPlaying games on your phone is more than just a pastime. It can be a great way to make money online through platforms like Mistplay.Mistplay is the no. 1 loyalty program for mobile gamers to help you discover new games, earn points, and redeem rewards. It is available for download on Google Play, which means that Android users can use Mistplay to earn points and rewards wherever they have their devices.Like other platforms, Mistplay rewards players in points rather than US dollars. These points hold a USD value, but the value can change depending on which payment method you decide to use to payout your points. In general, you can expect to earn 200 points per game to reach the 1,500-point cashout limit. This is equivalent to $5 in a gift card or PayPal payment.5. Watch Videos on InboxDollarsIf you like watching videos, you can turn a leisure activity into a money-making pastime with sites like InboxDollars. The best part? You can earn a whopping $30 by signing up and setting up your account.InboxDollars, like other platforms on this list, is a full-spectrum GPT site. You can earn free cash by taking online surveys, playing games, shopping through their platform, watching videos, and reading emails. They have paid out over $80 million in cash rewards, making them one of the leading online get-paid-to platforms today.InboxDollars understands that people come to their site because they want to make money fast. They help you make your first $30 by following their step-by-step instructions to set up your account and take your first surveys. You’ll get your first $5 just for registering, which means you can reach your $10 goal easily.6. Earn Cashback on MyPointsIf you’re looking for an effortless way to save money while online shopping, MyPoints is a fantastic way to save money and even get free money by completing simple tasks.MyPoints is a well-established online rewards platform that offers cashback and rewards to users for shopping online through affiliated retailers and completing GPT tasks. To explore cashback offers on MyPoints, navigate to the “Earn” section on their website and click “Cashback”. You can review cashback offers from partnered retailers, and MyPoints will navigate you through their platform to the retailer’s site and reward you with cashback when you make a purchase.One of the best parts about shopping with MyPoints is that you can get a $5 bonus in the form of a Visa debit card or Amazon gift card just for signing up. You don’t even have to make a purchase to qualify for this offer. Once you sign up and confirm your email address, MyPoints will send you your bonus in the method you choose.7. Scan Your Receipts with IbottaDon’t throw away your grocery store receipts; use them to earn extra cash instead with Ibotta.Ibotta is a popular mobile app and cashback platform that allows you to earn cash rewards for making everyday purchases, such as grocery shopping, clothing, or electronics. The way it works is that you can scan your receipts or link your in-store loyalty cards to Ibotta to track your purchases. Once Ibotta verifies your purchase and identifies any cashback opportunities, they will credit the cashback to your account.Reaching your $10 is as simple as signing up and making your first purchase on Ibotta. They will credit $10 to your account when you spend at least $30 at one of their partnered stores, which includes Walmart, Ebay, Best Buy, and Home Depot. Once you upload your receipt or Ibotta confirms your purchase, you will receive your bonus in your account and can transfer to your PayPal account.8. Shop with RakutenOne of the easiest ways to earn free PayPal cash is to sign up for a Rakuten account. Formerly known as Ebates, Rakuten is a cashback website and browser extension that gives you cashback when you shop at partnered retailers.The way it works is that retailers pay Rakuten to drive traffic and shoppers to their websites. Rakuten tracks your browser’s cookies to see when you make a purchase at one of their retail partner’s sites and pays you a portion of what they earn in commissions as cashback. In the end, everyone wins.Rakuten offers a great welcome bonus when you sign up to earn cashback through their site. They will reward you $10 when you sign up to become a new member and make a qualifying purchase of at least $25 within the first 90 days. A qualifying purchase is a purchase that earns cash back through Rakuten. This is a relatively simple task given that Rakuten is partnered with over 3,500 retailers, such as Target, Best Buy, and Nordstrom.9. Drive for Uber EatsThe side hustle economy has offered people a flexible and on-demand way to make fast money. Driving for Uber Eats is one of the best ways to earn $10 or more instantly with very little effort.The biggest advantage of earning money through Uber Eats is the ability to work according to your own schedule. Once you’re online and ready to work, you can start accepting orders through the app and earning roughly $19 per hour. Depending on where you are and when you’re driving, you can earn $10 with only a few orders.Uber Eats offers two ways to cash out your earnings immediately: transferring funds to your personal debit card or using the Uber Pro Card. You can transfer money to your personal debit card up to five times per day, but you will be docked $0.85 per cashout. If you don’t want to lose any money to transfer fees, you can access your earnings through the Uber Pro Card and checking account.10. Invest with RobinhoodIf you’re ready to start your investment journey, Robinhood is a free investing platform that offers one free stock when you open an account.Robinhood offers a user-friendly and commission-free approach to stock trading. To get started, you just need to download the app and create your account with required information, such as your name, email address, and Social Security number.When you sign up for Robinhood, they will give you one free stock when you sign up and link an active bank account. After you link your account, you will receive a specified amount that you can use to purchase a fractional share of the company of your choosing. The dollar amount can range from $5 to $200, but most people will get a reward of $5 to $10.Final WordsEarning $10 in free PayPal money is possible through several online avenues. While some sites may offer $10 PayPal money instantly, some of these methods can require time, effort, and patience.The best way to ensure that you can get free money is to research the platforms and beware of scams. With due diligence, you should be able to get $10 transferred to your PayPal account easily.
html:
We get it. There are some times when you need extra money in your bank account now. While earning money usually requires time and effort, there are legitimate ways that you can get free money directly to your PayPal account.

Does this sound too good to be true? We promise it isn’t – but in all transparency it won’t be instant – it will take some time and effort.

Lots of cashback, get-paid-to (GPT), and survey sites offer hefty welcome bonuses to get new users to sign up and get started. Leveraging these sign-up bonuses can help boost your bank account balance now and potentially earn you money in the future.

Keep reading to learn more about 10 ways you can earn free $10 PayPal money now.

How to Get $10 Free PayPal Money Now

  1. Take Surveys on Branded Surveys
  2. Make Money with Survey Junkie
  3. Earn Points with Swagbucks
  4. Play Games on Mistplay
  5. Watch Videos on InboxDollars
  6. Earn Cashback on MyPoints
  7. Scan Your Receipts with Ibotta
  8. Shop with Rakuten
  9. Drive for Uber Eats
  10. Invest with Robinhood

1. Take Surveys on Branded Surveys

We all have opinions, so why not get paid for them? Taking surveys on Branded Surveys is an easy way to make real money in your free time.

In exchange for your honest feedback, Branded Surveys will reward you with points that accumulate over time. Once you have 1,000 points (equivalent to $10), you can cash out your earnings in the form of gift cards or a PayPal payment.

The biggest question surrounding online surveys is whether they are worth it or not. While you won’t get rich on Branded Surveys, you can earn anywhere from five to 100 points per activity that you complete.

If you take enough surveys and do all the initial tasks, you should be able to easily reach the 1,000 point threshold.

2. Make Money with Survey Junkie

If you are looking for a way to earn free gift cards and extra cash in your spare time, taking surveys through Survey Junkie can get you $10 through PayPal in no time.

Survey Junkie is one of the most popular get-paid-to (GPT) sites on the internet. They have more than 20 million members worldwide and have paid out over $1 million since their platform launched.

The earning potential on Survey Junkie is pretty good compared to other GPT and survey sites. By just taking surveys, you can expect to earn as much as $3 per survey and up to $40 per month.

You can earn even more by utilizing Survey Junkie’s referral program. When you send a referral link to your friends and family, you both will earn $5 in your account balance when they sign up for an account. This means you can earn $10 instantly by referring only two friends to the platform.

3. Earn Points with Swagbucks

You can earn $10 easily with Swagbucks’ sign-up promo, but your earning potential doesn’t stop there. You can rack up PayPal cash rewards, Amazon gift cards, and more by shopping online, taking surveys, and playing games in your free time.

Swagbucks is a popular and reputable GPT site that offers several ways to earn money online by performing simple tasks. Like other survey and GPT sites, Swagbucks partners with retailers and market research companies to gain consumer insights through surveys and other interactive tasks, such as playing games and watching videos.

Earning your first $10 with Swagbucks is easy with their sign-on bonus. Signing up is easy, and it only takes a few minutes to get your account set up and ready to go. To receive your bonus, you have to spend at least $25 through Swagbucks’ cashback platform under the URL Swagbucks.com/Shop. Once your purchase is confirmed, Swagbucks will deposit 1,000, equivalent to $10, into your account.

4. Play Games on Mistplay

Playing games on your phone is more than just a pastime. It can be a great way to make money online through platforms like Mistplay.

Mistplay is the no. 1 loyalty program for mobile gamers to help you discover new games, earn points, and redeem rewards. It is available for download on Google Play, which means that Android users can use Mistplay to earn points and rewards wherever they have their devices.

Like other platforms, Mistplay rewards players in points rather than US dollars. These points hold a USD value, but the value can change depending on which payment method you decide to use to payout your points. In general, you can expect to earn 200 points per game to reach the 1,500-point cashout limit. This is equivalent to $5 in a gift card or PayPal payment.

5. Watch Videos on InboxDollars

If you like watching videos, you can turn a leisure activity into a money-making pastime with sites like InboxDollars. The best part? You can earn a whopping $30 by signing up and setting up your account.

InboxDollars, like other platforms on this list, is a full-spectrum GPT site. You can earn free cash by taking online surveys, playing games, shopping through their platform, watching videos, and reading emails. They have paid out over $80 million in cash rewards, making them one of the leading online get-paid-to platforms today.

InboxDollars understands that people come to their site because they want to make money fast. They help you make your first $30 by following their step-by-step instructions to set up your account and take your first surveys. You’ll get your first $5 just for registering, which means you can reach your $10 goal easily.

6. Earn Cashback on MyPoints

If you’re looking for an effortless way to save money while online shopping, MyPoints is a fantastic way to save money and even get free money by completing simple tasks.

MyPoints is a well-established online rewards platform that offers cashback and rewards to users for shopping online through affiliated retailers and completing GPT tasks. To explore cashback offers on MyPoints, navigate to the “Earn” section on their website and click “Cashback”. You can review cashback offers from partnered retailers, and MyPoints will navigate you through their platform to the retailer’s site and reward you with cashback when you make a purchase.

One of the best parts about shopping with MyPoints is that you can get a $5 bonus in the form of a Visa debit card or Amazon gift card just for signing up. You don’t even have to make a purchase to qualify for this offer. Once you sign up and confirm your email address, MyPoints will send you your bonus in the method you choose.

7. Scan Your Receipts with Ibotta

Don’t throw away your grocery store receipts; use them to earn extra cash instead with Ibotta.

Ibotta is a popular mobile app and cashback platform that allows you to earn cash rewards for making everyday purchases, such as grocery shopping, clothing, or electronics. The way it works is that you can scan your receipts or link your in-store loyalty cards to Ibotta to track your purchases. Once Ibotta verifies your purchase and identifies any cashback opportunities, they will credit the cashback to your account.

Reaching your $10 is as simple as signing up and making your first purchase on Ibotta. They will credit $10 to your account when you spend at least $30 at one of their partnered stores, which includes Walmart, Ebay, Best Buy, and Home Depot. Once you upload your receipt or Ibotta confirms your purchase, you will receive your bonus in your account and can transfer to your PayPal account.

8. Shop with Rakuten

One of the easiest ways to earn free PayPal cash is to sign up for a Rakuten account. Formerly known as Ebates, Rakuten is a cashback website and browser extension that gives you cashback when you shop at partnered retailers.

The way it works is that retailers pay Rakuten to drive traffic and shoppers to their websites. Rakuten tracks your browser’s cookies to see when you make a purchase at one of their retail partner’s sites and pays you a portion of what they earn in commissions as cashback. In the end, everyone wins.

Rakuten offers a great welcome bonus when you sign up to earn cashback through their site. They will reward you $10 when you sign up to become a new member and make a qualifying purchase of at least $25 within the first 90 days. A qualifying purchase is a purchase that earns cash back through Rakuten. This is a relatively simple task given that Rakuten is partnered with over 3,500 retailers, such as Target, Best Buy, and Nordstrom.

9. Drive for Uber Eats

The side hustle economy has offered people a flexible and on-demand way to make fast money. Driving for Uber Eats is one of the best ways to earn $10 or more instantly with very little effort.

The biggest advantage of earning money through Uber Eats is the ability to work according to your own schedule. Once you’re online and ready to work, you can start accepting orders through the app and earning roughly $19 per hour. Depending on where you are and when you’re driving, you can earn $10 with only a few orders.

Uber Eats offers two ways to cash out your earnings immediately: transferring funds to your personal debit card or using the Uber Pro Card. You can transfer money to your personal debit card up to five times per day, but you will be docked $0.85 per cashout. If you don’t want to lose any money to transfer fees, you can access your earnings through the Uber Pro Card and checking account.

10. Invest with Robinhood

If you’re ready to start your investment journey, Robinhood is a free investing platform that offers one free stock when you open an account.

Robinhood offers a user-friendly and commission-free approach to stock trading. To get started, you just need to download the app and create your account with required information, such as your name, email address, and Social Security number.

When you sign up for Robinhood, they will give you one free stock when you sign up and link an active bank account. After you link your account, you will receive a specified amount that you can use to purchase a fractional share of the company of your choosing. The dollar amount can range from $5 to $200, but most people will get a reward of $5 to $10.

Final Words

Earning $10 in free PayPal money is possible through several online avenues. While some sites may offer $10 PayPal money instantly, some of these methods can require time, effort, and patience.

The best way to ensure that you can get free money is to research the platforms and beware of scams. With due diligence, you should be able to get $10 transferred to your PayPal account easily.
